Legends.moves.outcome.fail: The Narrator decides on a narrative development detrimental to the Hero, and can give or remove a tag or status in a way that hinders the Hero.
Legends.moves.outcome.partial:
The action unfolds as expected, or better, achieving its intended goal or overcoming an obstacle. The Narrator can also give you a useful tag or status.

Legends.moves.outcome.success:

You can Push your Luck:

Accept Consequences for Great Success (Quick) or for +1 Power to spend (Detailed).
Legends.moves.reaction.name: Reaction
Legends.moves.quickOutcome.name: Quick Outcome
Legends.moves.detailedOutcome.name: Detailed Outcome
Legends.moves.reaction.partial: You succeed and may spend PWR Power only to lessen the Consequences.
Legends.moves.reaction.success: You succeed and may spend PWR+1 Power, on any Effect.
Legends.moves.sacrifice.fail:
It is in Vain...
You pay in full the Consequence of your Sacrifice, but nothing comes out of it, or things go terribly wrong. The Narrator may add further Consequences (especially Ill Tidings).
Legends.moves.sacrifice.partial:
It is Fate!
You Succeed but pay in full the Consequences of your Sacrifice.
Legends.moves.sacrifice.success:
It is a Miracle!
You Succeed and your Sacrifice is lessened by one level.
Legends.moves.sacrifice.painful.name: Sacrifice (Painful)
Legends.moves.sacrifice.painful.conseque: Scratch all tags in a relevant theme (only one tag if lessened)
Legends.moves.sacrifice.painful.successf:
Achieve something unlikely or that would normally take much longer or require much more resources
Match the Might of a Challenge one level higher or lower than you have in this situation for the duration of a scene.
Legends.moves.sacrifice.scarring.name: Sacrifice (Scarring)
Legends.moves.sacrifice.scarring.success:
Achieve something extraordinary.
Match the Might of a Challenge two levels higher or lower than you have in this situation for the duration of a scene.
Legends.moves.sacrifice.grave.name: Sacrifice (Grave)
Legends.moves.sacrifice.grave.consequenc: Take a tier-6 status without lessening
Legends.moves.sacrifice.grave.successful:
Achieve something impossible.
Save someone from certain death or bring them back from the dead (if the moment allows for it).
